title: India's Coal Output Jumped 3.6% in December
summary: India produced 101.45 million tons of coal last month, which represented a 3.6% increase on a year earlier, the Hindu reported today, noting the amount exceeded a monthly target of 87.06 million tons. title: Saudi Aramco Signs Long-Term LNG Supply Agreement in Louisiana
summary: Saudi Aramco signed a long-term supply deal with Commonwealth LNG, Reuters has reported, citing unnamed sources in the know. The size of the annual shipments will be 1 million tons. The Cameron, Louisiana, facility will have a nameplate annual capacity of 9.5 million tons of liquefied gas. Original…

title: Greenland Turns Into an Alliance Problem, Not a Strategic Asset
summary: European officials are now publicly warning that a unilateral U.S. military move on Greenland would rupture NATO. title: Enverus: Venezuela To Increase Oil Output 50% By 2035
summary: Industry consultant Enverus has predicted that Venezuela will increase oil production 50% and hit 1.5 million barrels a day by 2035 following the capture of long-time leader Nicolas Maduro by the Trump administration. title: Kazakhstan Cut December Oil Output By 230 Kb/d
summary: Kazakhstan cut oil production in December by more than 200 Kb/d, with output averaging 1.522 million barrels per day in the final month down from 1.759 mb/d in November.
